name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for Student Customer with no RM

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930040000140"

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey | notes |
| 0100000930040000140 | Student Customer with no RM |

Then the following data Relationship Management Information should be returned
| relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation |
|  |  |  |  | (1890) 788336 |  |  | Youth Third Level | STARTING_OUT |

children.description: Validate response: | relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation | | | | | | (1890) 788336 | | | Youth Third Level | STARTING_OUT |
